summary:
**Meeting Overview**:  
The Building Inspection Advisory, Examining and Appeals Board of the City of Dallas will convene on January 21, 2025, at 11:30 A.M. at the Oak Cliff Municipal Center. The meeting aims to discuss key operational matters, including the approval of previous minutes and the annual report, as well as potential amendments to building codes.

**Key Agenda Items**:  
1. Call to Order  
2. Review and Approval of Minutes from the May 21, 2024, meeting  
3. Review and Approval of the FY 23-24 BIAEAB Annual Report  
4. Briefing on requests for amendments to the International Residential Code  
5. Adjournment  

**Important Details**:  
The meeting will include a review of the annual report, which outlines the board's activities and performance over the fiscal year. Additionally, there will be a briefing regarding proposed amendments to the International Residential Code, which could impact local building regulations and compliance standards.

**Action Items**:  
The board will seek approval for the minutes from the previous meeting and the annual report. They will also discuss and potentially endorse amendments to the International Residential Code, which may require further deliberation or adjustments based on feedback from board members and stakeholders. 

Participants wishing to speak must register in advance, and accommodations are available for those needing assistance.
